title: Get Started with MongoDB in Hasura Cloud
description: A comprehensive guide to setting up MongoDB with Hasura Cloud. Learn how to connect your MongoDB database, track collections, and execute GraphQL queries seamlessly using Hasura Cloud's intuitive interface.
